name: Yeast (because it rises)
description:
Do you like donuts? I do too!

You are Captain Donaught, an adventure seeker looking to make history by setting the world height record!

Take off inside your sprinkle powered ship, and defeat the evil bandits trying to stop your goal and steal your donuts!

DISCLAIMER: MAY NOT BE ENTIRELY SEEABLE IN LAPTOPS AND MONITORS SMALLER THAN 15 INCHES.

Controls are in-game.

See if you can beat the top score of: 1347!

Made by: Decacentum

Music by: Joe-Hills-Composer
